Text: The person that wrote the synopsis are fucking morons its not "bullets left in the clip" it should be "bullets left in the magazine" a clip is something you strip bullets/ammunition off of in order to load an internal box magazine there are a few other applications however, moreover the only weapon that I'm personally aware of where the stripper clip actually stays in the weapon while it is being fired and then is ejected when all rounds are fired is the m1 garand and is known as a clip fed weapon. This quote is taken directly from Wikipedia "A magazine is an ammunition storage and feeding device within or attached to a repeating firearm. Magazines may be integral to the firearm (fixed) or removable (detachable). The magazine functions by moving the cartridges stored in the magazine into a position where they may be loaded into the chamber by the action of the firearm. The detachable magazine is often controversially referred to as a clip". Anyway thanks for the upload.

Grammer-Does it Matter,Really-
We just want to know about quality of movie period.
